cards.textEn: WHO does not recommend any specific measures for travellers, or any travel or trade restrictions.
Preliminary investigations conducted by the Chinese authorities have found no clear evidence of human-to-human transmission of the novel #coronavirus (2019-nCoV) identified in #Wuhan, #ChinağŸ‡¨ğŸ‡³.
A tourist in Thailand has become the first person outside China diagnosed with a new, pneumonia-like virus that has already infected dozens of people.
For the moment, WHO does not recommend any broader restrictions on travel or trade.  We recommend exit screening at airports as part of a comprehensive set of containment measures

We appreciate the seriousness with which China is taking this outbreak, especially the commitment from top leadership, and the transparency they have demonstrated, including sharing data and genetic sequence of the virus.
